scenario: In 2025, Grace has an Adjusted Gross Income (AGI) (or contribution base) of $103,259.71. Grace makes a charitable contribution of $62,419.64 in cash to a public charity. Under I.R.C. § 170(d)(1)(A), the deduction is limited to 50% of the contribution base.
question: Calculate the allowable charitable deduction for 2025.
answer_explanation: The deduction is limited to 50% of AGI ($51,629.86). Since the contribution ($62,419.64) is compared to the limit, the allowable deduction is $51,629.86.
reasoning: Calculated limit and compared to contribution.
